Identity.Name: Vraly, Olantan Chief
Identity.Basic_Description: large berserker with industrial pipes sticking out of the body

Abilities.Name: Draw Focus
Abilities.Ability: Allied units within 2 range of Vral cannot be targetted by ranged attacks

Abilities.Name: Unrelenting
Abilities.Ability: If this unit has more damage than health, it is not defeated until the end of the round.
